scripts.clean: rimraf starterts/ && rimraf starterjs/ && rimraf dist/
scripts.test-dev: npm run ts:build && cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 mocha --reporter=list --timeout=0
scripts.test-jenkins: npm run ts:build && cross-env JUNIT_REPORT_PATH=./report.xml mocha --colors --reporter mocha-jenkins-reporter --timeout=0
scripts.start-dev: cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 cross-env DEBUG=http,mindconnect* concurrently --raw "npm run ts:watch" "npm run test:watch"
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 cross-env concurrently --raw "npm run ts:watch" "npm run test:watch"
scripts.start-agent-dev: npm run ts:build && cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 cross-env DEBUG=http,mindconnect-agent,mindconnect-fileencoder node ./src/demoagent/test-agent.js
scripts.doc: typedoc -out docs --excludePrivate --readme ./README.md --target es6 --name mindconnect-nodejs --exclude "**/*+(test-agent|index|.spec|.e2e).ts" --externalPattern "**/node_modules/**" --ignoreCompilerErrors && cp -R images docs/images/ && cp CHANGELOG.md docs/CHANGELOG.md
scripts.starterjs: npm pack --unsafe-perm && rimraf starterts && mkdir starterjs && mv ./*.tgz starterjs/ && cp templates/js/index.txt starterjs/index.js && node templates/generate.js ./js/package_template.json >> starterjs/package.json
scripts.starterts: npm pack --unsafe-perm && mkdir starterts && mv ./*.tgz starterts/ && cp templates/ts/index.txt starterts/index.ts && node templates/generate.js ./ts/package_template.json >> starterts/package.json && cp templates/ts/ts.json starterts/tsconfig.json
